credits: Image: IWDRM, from the movie Fight Club.

title: Welcome!
text: You can now start adding sites by going to it's url and clicking on the icon.
credits: Image: TECH NOIR, from the movie Submarine.

text: Maybe you need to get away from the screen for a bit?
credits: Image: TECH NOIR, from the movie Submarine.

text: Sometimes all you need is a breeze of fresh air...
credits: Image: TECH NOIR, from the movie Submarine.

title: Are you sure?
credits: Image: IWDRM, from the movie The Truman Show.

title: Don't stop!
text: Just pause for a second and breath...
credits: Image: TECH NOIR, from the movie Submarine.

text: Replace fear of the unknown with curiosity.
Decide that you want it more than you are afraid of it.
Yesterday is history; tomorrow is a mystery. Today is a gift, which is why we call it the present. -- Bil Keane
